citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 a.m. on
15-Aug-17.
No contact was made with any person at the facility. The licensee was contacted by phone and stated no one was
available to accompany during the inspection.
